author: barnabasbusa
content:
yes, it should still be valid even if your signature and withdrawal_credentials are empty. Assuming you had a valid deposit before for that validator. 

Beaconchain is also showing this on their dashboard, if you click on dashboard/deposits and hover next to the validity field.

author: barnabasbusa
content: also if you navigate to your specific top up deposit, it should be decoded for a successful beaconchain deposit with withdrawal cred 0x00..
